Plot: A young woman who has been in and out of rehab for the past 10 years returns home for the weekend for her sister's wedding.
Title: Rachel Getting Married
Actors: Sebastian Stan, Roslyn Ruff, Anne Hathaway, Bill Irwin
tomatoConsensus: Rachel Getting Married is an engrossing tale of family angst, highlighted by Anne Hathaway's powerful performance and director Jonathan Demme's return to form.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 31 wins & 59 nominations.
